# Multi-tenant SSO

## Overview

We support the following multi-tenant SSO providers out of the box:

- Active Directory
- Google Workspaces
- Okta

## Provider Configs

- Adding a configs to the core (CURL request)

## Frontend

- Code snippet that shows the usage of:
  - `ThirdParty.getConfiguredProviders`

## Backend

- Code snippet
  - with empty providers list
